mapper.insert: insert into reservation (name, mobile, time, visitor, type, status, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, remark) values (#{name},#{mobile},#{time},#{visitor},#{type},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createBy},#{updateBy},#{remark})
mapper.select: select time,(6-count(*)) count from reservation where create_time between #{beganTime} and #{endTime}
